MAIN_MESSAGE: We are currently experiencing problems with the electricity supply in your area.  Our engineers are now working on the fault and we hope to have your electricity restored by 01-DEC-2020 16:00.  Please accept our sincere apologies for the inconvenience this is causing.
TRANSCRIPT: There is a power cut in the DG12 postcode area of Annan. We appreciate you have now been without power for some time. Engineers are making progress with the repair on a pillar located outside 32 Winterhope Road and we still expect your power to be restored by 4pm. We will update this message if this information changes. Thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 1.42pm on Tuesday 1st December 2020.
